Package gate.creole.annic.apache.lucene.store

Binary i/o API, used for all index data.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Directory A Directory is a flat list of files.
FSDirectory Straightforward implementation of Directory as a directory of files.
FSInputStream  
FSOutputStream  
InputStream Abstract base class for input from a file in a Directory.
Lock An interprocess mutex lock.
Lock.With Utility class for executing code with exclusive access.
OutputStream Abstract class for output to a file in a Directory.
RAMDirectory A memory-resident Directory implementation.
RAMFile  
RAMInputStream A memory-resident InputStream implementation.
RAMOutputStream A memory-resident OutputStream implementation.
